entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
